Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Outflow valve control malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pneumatic Starter component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 18/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
